class.name: ConfirmationDialog
class.description: Dialog for confirmation of actions. This dialog inherits from [AcceptDialog], but has by default an OK and Cancel button (in host OS order). To get cancel action, you can use: [codeblock] get_cancel().connect("pressed", self, "cancelled") [/codeblock].

method.name: get_cancel
method.description: Returns the cancel button. [b]Warning:[/b] This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [member CanvasItem.visible] property.
